body_html:
@peterjc123 Thank you so much! I am on CUDA compute capability 3.0, for which support has been dropped from Pytorch 19 days ago, so I kindly request you if you could keep older versions of your Pytorch compilations on Anaconda, just in case a new version of Pytorch breaks with my hardware.

EDIT: I only just saw the legacy packages. That works perfectly, thanks!

body:
@peterjc123 Thank you so much! I am on CUDA compute capability 3.0, for which support has been dropped from Pytorch 19 days ago, so I kindly request you if you could keep older versions of your Pytorch compilations on Anaconda, just in case a new version of Pytorch breaks with my hardware.

EDIT: I only just saw the legacy packages. That works perfectly, thanks!
